mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist, the american negro boy DICK, aged about 45 years, and 5 feet 6 inches high, and saying he belongs to Mr. Trasimond Landry, of Ascension. The owner is hereby duly notified to claim his property according to law. U. JACOB, sheriff. St John the Baptist, May 17th, 1862

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
